h2_title: Where to use Mind Cores in Black Myth: Wukong
content: Mind Cores can be used at Xu Dog in the Crouching Tiger Temple \- Cellar area to upgrade your stats. From the Shrine, you can look to your right to find Xu Dog who will upgrade your stats.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Mind_Core.md', within the main section titled 'Mind Core', specifically from the subsection 'Where to use Mind Cores in Black Myth: Wukong'.
The content is as follows:
Mind Cores can be used at Xu Dog in the Crouching Tiger Temple \- Cellar area to upgrade your stats. From the Shrine, you can look to your right to find Xu Dog who will upgrade your stats.
